mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_elderly_message where idcardno=#{idcardno} and elderName = #{elderName} limit 0,1
SELECT * FROM t_elderly_message limit #{page_ye},#{page_size}

SELECT id,elderName,idcardno,mobile,qrCoder FROM t_elderly_message a where a.id IN
#{id}
SELECT id,elderName,sexDictId,age,realAddress,homeTel,idcardno,mobile FROM `t_elderly_message` WHERE qrCoder=#{qrCoder} and status = 1 and isDeath=1;
SELECT * FROM t_elderly_message where idcardno=#{cardNo} and status = 1
SELECT * FROM t_elderly_message m ,t_gold_elderly g where m.idcardno=#{cardNo} and m.status = 1 and m.id=g.id
SELECT elderName FROM t_elderly_message where idcardno=#{idcardno} and status = 1
SELECT a.*,(select id>0 from t_elderly_govbuy d where a.id =d.elderId) govBuy FROM t_elderly_message a where idcardno=#{cardNo} and status = 1
SELECT id,elderName,areaName,age,sexDictId,mobile,idcardno,elderTypeDictIds,realAddress FROM t_elderly_message where age=#{age} and status = 1 and isDeath=1
mapper.update: update t_elderly_message set status = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
update t_elderly_message set isDeath = 0,deathTime=now() WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE t_elderly_message set isDeath = 0,deathTime=now() WHERE id in
#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_elderly_message
photo,
elderName,
age,
sexDictId,
birthday,
nationDictId,
idcardno,
homeTel,
mobile,
regPlace,
realAddress,

deptCode,

elderTypeDictIds,

jobDictId,

careCondition1,
careCondition2,
serviceNeed,
otherSlow,
bodyDictId,
inteDisabled,
listenDictId,
manyDictId,
spiritDictId,
speakDictId,
visionDictId,
socialActiDictId,
specialAbility,
retiredType,
elderDisease,
specialDictIds,
houseTypeDictId,
otherSlowplus,
roomTypeDictId,
livingCondition1,
livingCondition2,
livingCondition3,
livingCondition4,
livingCondition5,
status,

helpCardApplyFlag,
areaOrder,
cremationUnit,
helpCardNo,

mapper.update:
UPDATE t_elderly_message
photo = #{photo},
abilityAssess = #{abilityAssess},
elderName = #{elderName},
age = #{age},
sexDictId = #{sexDictId},
birthday = #{birthday},
nationDictId = #{nationDictId},
idcardno = #{idcardno},
homeTel = #{homeTel},
mobile = #{mobile},
serviceOrgId = #{serviceOrgId},
regPlace = #{regPlace},
realAddress = #{realAddress},
maritalStatus = #{maritalStatus},
deptCode = #{deptCode},
areaId = #{areaId},
communityId = #{communityId},
ensureTreaDictId = #{ensureTreaDictId},
socialCardCode = #{socialCardCode},
liveTypeDictId = #{liveTypeDictId},
isLocation = #{isLocation},
serialNumber = #{serialNumber},
educationDictId = #{educationDictId},
liveYearDictId = #{liveYearDictId},
elderTypeDictIds = #{elderTypeDictIds},
zipCode = #{zipCode},
jobDictId = #{jobDictId},
incomeSource = #{incomeSource},
childrenDictId = #{childrenDictId},
medicalType = #{medicalType},
residenceDictId = #{residenceDictId},
residenceRemark = #{residenceRemark},
careCondition1 = #{careCondition1},
careCondition2 = #{careCondition2},
serviceNeed = #{serviceNeed},
otherSlow = #{otherSlow},
bodyDictId = #{bodyDictId},
inteDisabled = #{inteDisabled},
listenDictId = #{listenDictId},
manyDictId = #{manyDictId},
spiritDictId = #{spiritDictId},
speakDictId = #{speakDictId},
visionDictId = #{visionDictId},
socialActiDictId = #{socialActiDictId},
specialAbility = #{specialAbility},
retiredType = #{retiredType},
elderDisease = #{elderDisease},
specialDictIds = #{specialDictIds},
otherSlowplus = #{otherSlowplus},
houseTypeDictId = #{houseTypeDictId},
roomTypeDictId = #{roomTypeDictId},
livingCondition1 = #{livingCondition1},
livingCondition2 = #{livingCondition2},
livingCondition3 = #{livingCondition3},
livingCondition4 = #{livingCondition4},
livingCondition5 = #{livingCondition5},
status = #{status},
deleted = #{deleted},
createUserId = #{createUserId},
createOrgId = #{createOrgId},
createTime = #{createTime},
objid = #{objid},
isImport80 = #{isImport80},
isDeath = #{isDeath},
updateUserId = #{updateUserId},
updateTime = #{updateTime},
psychologicDictId = #{psychologicDictId},
saTypeDictIds = #{saTypeDictIds},
hasElevator = #{hasElevator},
floor = #{floor},
hasToilet = #{hasToilet},
hasBath = #{hasBath},
areaName = #{areaName},
deathTime = #{deathTime},
cremationTime = #{cremationTime},
bloodType = #{bloodType},
isOneChild = #{isOneChild},
houseNature = #{houseNature},
politics = #{politics},
healthStatus = #{healthStatus},
drugAllergy = #{drugAllergy},
selfcareAbility = #{selfcareAbility},
helpCardApplyFlag = #{helpCardApplyFlag},
areaOrder = #{areaOrder},
helpCardNo = #{helpCardNo}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_elderly_message WHERE areaId = #{areaId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_elderly_message
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_elderly_message where status = 1 and isDeath=1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_elderly_message a LEFT JOIN t_elderly_assessment c ON (a.id = c.elderId ) WHERE a.status = 1 and c.elderId = #{filter.id}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_elderly_assessment a where a.elderId = #{filter.id}

select SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(areaName,',',2),',',-1) AS Region1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(areaName,',',3),',',-1) AS Region2, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(areaName,',',4),',',-1) as Region3, elderName,idcardno,realAddress,SUBSTRING(idcardno,7,8) birthday from t_elderly_message WHERE isDeath=1 and `status`=1 and elderTypeDictIds=#{filter.elderTypeDictIds} ORDER BY areaOrder
select id,elderName,cremationTime,sexDictId,nationDictId,realAddress,zipCode,homeTel,mobile,cremationUnit,regPlace,areaName from t_elderly_message WHERE isDeath=0 and `status`=1
SELECT * FROM t_elderly_message where helpCardNo = #{helpCardNo} and isDeath=1 and `status`=1
mapper.update: update t_elderly_message set helpCardNo = #{helpCardNo} where idcardno = #{idcardno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_elderly_message where hometel=#{phone} or mobile=#{phone} limit 0,1
